plugins.name: bug-hunt
plugins.description: Enhanced bug hunting workflow with implementation agent

plugins.name: pr-review
plugins.description: Comprehensive PR review agents for comments, tests, error handling, type design, and code quality

plugins.name: dev-flow
plugins.description: Comprehensive 12-phase feature development workflow with specialized agents for discovery, design, implementation, and quality assurance

plugins.name: phase0
plugins.description: Pre-flight exploration, pattern enforcement, and context management. Includes /audit, /conform, /inventory for codebase quality.

plugins.name: hygen-ripper
plugins.description: The Template Powerhouse. 4 commands: /hygen-rip (extract to staging), /hygen-promote (staging to _templates), /hygen-templates (manage library), /hygen-compare (code vs template review). Atomic staging, cross-plugin capsule integration.
